TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit OperatingSystem extends System.Object implements class System.ICloneable, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public NotInheritable Class OperatingSystem Implements ICloneable, ISerializable
public ref class OperatingSystem sealed : ICloneable, System::Runtime::Serialization::ISerializable

summary.span: 表示有关操作系统的信息，如版本和平台标识符。

span.span: Represents information about an operating system, such as the version and platform identifier.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类包含有关操作系统的信息。The class contains information about an operating system. 有关当前的运行时操作系统的信息，检索返回对象属性。For information about the current runtime operating system, retrieve the object returned by the property. 有关列表的 Windows 操作系统版本和其相应的版本号返回和属性和方法，请参阅[操作系统版本](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms724832.aspx)上 Windows 开发人员中心。For a list of Windows operating system versions and their corresponding version numbers returned by the and properties and the method, see [Operating System Version](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms724832.aspx) on the Windows Dev Center. 按照设计，类不是一般用途来描述操作系统，而且不能派生更广类型从类。By design, the class is not a general purpose means of describing an operating system, and you cannot derive a more inclusive type from the class. 如果你需要一个类型来包含有关操作系统的其他信息，创建你自己的类型，则包含类型的字段和任何其他字段、 属性或需要的方法。If you need a type to contain other information about an operating system, create your own type, then include a field of type and any additional fields, properties, or methods that you require. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用对象显示有关运行时操作系统的信息。The following code example uses the object to display information about the runtime operating system. [!code-csharp[System.Environment.OSVersion#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.environment.osversion/cs/osinfo1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Environment.OSVersion#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.environment.osversion/vb/osinfo1.vb#1)]

span.span: One of the values that indicates the operating system platform.

param.span: 对象，指示操作系统的版本。

span.span: A object that indicates the version of the operating system.

summary.span: 使用指定的平台标识符值和版本对象来初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, using the specified platform identifier value and version object.
is .
is not a enumeration value.

para.span: 如果你使用类检索有关运行时系统信息中，不应调用此构造函数实例化对象。

span.span: If you are using the class to retrieve information about the runtime operating system, you should not call this constructor to instantiate an object.

para.span: 相反，你可以检索对象，描述从操作系统属性。

span.span: Instead, you can retrieve an object that describes the operating system from the property.

One of the values.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ServicePack As String
public: property System::String ^ ServicePack { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取此 对象表示的 Service Pack 版本。

span.span: Gets the service pack version represented by this object.

value.span: 如果支持 Service Pack 并至少安装了一个 Service Pack，则为该 Service Pack 版本；否则为空字符串 ("")。

span.span: The service pack version, if service packs are supported and at least one is installed; otherwise, an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks Service pack 用于分发的操作系统，在其上安装的软件更新。A service pack is used to distribute software updates for the operating system on which it is installed. 但是，并非每个操作系统使用 service pack。However, not every operating system uses service packs. Service pack 版本中，如果可用，是已正确为显示进行格式化。The service pack version, if available, is already correctly formatted for display. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示属性。The following code example demonstrates the property. [!code-cpp[OperatingSystem.ServicePack#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/OperatingSystem.ServicePack/CPP/sp.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[OperatingSystem.ServicePack#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/OperatingSystem.ServicePack/CS/sp.cs#1)] [!code-vb[OperatingSystem.ServicePack#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/OperatingSystem.ServicePack/VB/sp.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取标识操作系统的 对象。

span.span: Gets a object that identifies the operating system.

value.span: 对象，描述操作系统的主版本号、次版本号、内部版本号和修订版本号。

span.span: A object that describes the major version, minor version, build, and revision numbers for the operating system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请参阅[操作系统版本](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms724832.aspx)的 Windows 操作系统版本和其相应的版本号列表 Windows 开发人员中心上。See [Operating System Version](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms724832.aspx) on the Windows Dev Center for a list of Windows operating system versions and their corresponding version numbers. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建几个对象，并显示每个属性。The following code example creates several objects and displays the property for each. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property VersionString As String
public: property System::String ^ VersionString { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取平台标识符、版本和当前安装在操作系统上的 Service Pack 的连接字符串表示形式。

span.span: Gets the concatenated string representation of the platform identifier, version, and service pack that are currently installed on the operating system.

value.span: 、 和 属性的返回值的字符串表示形式。

span.span: The string representation of the values returned by the , , and properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，返回的值返回的值相同方法。By default, the value returned by is the same as the value returned by the method. 但是，为不同的平台的.NET framework 实现可能会返回该平台的更合适字符串。However, an implementation of the .NET Framework for a different platform might return a more appropriate string for that platform. 请参阅[操作系统版本](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms724832.aspx)的 Windows 操作系统版本和其相应的版本号列表 Windows 开发人员中心上。See [Operating System Version](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms724832.aspx) on the Windows Dev Center for a list of Windows operating system versions and their corresponding version numbers. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示属性。The following code example demonstrates the property.
